review: So Far I have had a good experience with the Fire Stick.  Once in a while it will have to "catch up" with the internet, I don't know if that is normal or not.
author: Judy England

review: only work for one day first day I had it worked great next day then work anymore no customer service phone number to call anybody very disappointed
author: lance harris

review: It's a fire tv in a stick 10/10
author: jiff67

review: I like my Chromecast better...  for some reason the amazon stick will stutter, lag, and freeze while I'm watching Netflix or HBO go etc... a problem my Chromecast doesn't seem to have. besides, it's loaded with a ton of unnecessary, all (must be paid for) applications.
author: Dale Campbell
